About Figgle Media

We're a digital marketing agency with a singular focus: helping construction and home service companies dominate their local markets.

Our Story

Figgle Media was born from a simple observation: construction companies build incredible things, but most struggle to build an online presence that matches the quality of their work.

We saw roofers with 20 years of experience getting outranked by companies half their size. We watched master plumbers lose jobs to competitors with better websites. We knew there had to be a better way.

So we built a marketing agency specifically for the trades. We speak your language, understand your challenges, and know what it takes to turn online searches into booked jobs.

OUR MISSION
QUALITY MARKETING For Quality Contractors
Delivering Real Results

What We Stand For

Honesty

No smoke and mirrors. We tell you exactly what's working, what isn't, and what we're doing about it.

Results

Vanity metrics don't pay the bills. We focus on the numbers that matter: leads, calls, and jobs booked.

Partnership

We're not vendors, we're partners. Your success is our success, and we're in this for the long haul.

Specialization

We don't try to be everything to everyone. We focus exclusively on construction and home services.

Why We're Different

01

Industry Focus

We don't market restaurants, law firms, or retail stores. We market construction companies, period. This focus means we understand your business, your customers, and your competition.

02

No Long-Term Contracts

We believe in earning your business every month. That's why we don't lock you into lengthy contracts. If we're not delivering results, you're free to walk away.

03

Transparent Reporting

You'll always know exactly what we're doing and how it's performing. Monthly reports show real metrics—not vanity numbers—so you can see your ROI clearly.

04

You Own Everything

Your website, your content, your ad accounts—they're all yours. If you ever leave, you take everything with you. No hostage situations here.

Ready to Work Together?

Let's have a conversation about your business goals and how we can help you achieve them.

Get in Touch
Figgle Media

Digital marketing that rides hard and delivers results. Your trusted partner on the digital frontier.
